text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Get with it woman!  Stop lying. The United States is nowhere near it should be in testing for the Coronavirus. Do you not listen to the radio or the news or the doctors who were saying we need more testing in this country. What is your problem? Covering for Donnie again.?
